metadata.title: CVE-2020-13239 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The DMS/ECM module in Dolibarr 11.0.4 renders user-uploaded .html files inthe browser when the attachment parameter is removed from the directdownload link. This causes XSS.

criterions.comment: dolibarr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
